dmca.title: Rabbi complains of copied articles
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs 

I write to you in regards to the following post on this blog: 
http://rebbegod.blogspot.com/2005/12/chassidic-new-year.html
 
the material reproduced here is directly taken from my website/weekly emails which I have been producing for over 7 years. The direct link to the same article on my site appears here:
http://www.ohrtmimim.org/Torah_Default.asp?id=1019 

The author of the above Blog has made two small changes to the text near the end of the article  but writing things like this is against the Jewish religion and is putting my name into disrespect within the Internet world and beyond. It
